name: run Run RUN!
description:
One of my friends challenged me to make a gameboy game so I joined GBJam9. 

This is a simple runner game. Keep drinking potions until you escape the monster and avoid falling in the pits. Jump on 'spacebar' button and win by escaping the hungry monster.

Game details: 

  • The game code is created in Javascript. 
  • The graphics are created in Photoshop (4 colors scheme). 
  • The sound effects are generated with https://sfxr.me
  • The music is generated with MuseNet.

GameBoy html/css framework made by: 

https://github.com/baumannzone/gameboy-css

Only 4 colors used:
